title: Disconnection and not allowed to reconnect mid game.
body: I was just in a game for the 3rd time where I am disconnected mid game. I remember this happened before and I was reported by leavebuster. I was just winning my game top lane as heimindinger into singed top. My whole team was winning. I was enjoying the game. Every other application works fine but league of legends just crashes over and over. It says retry disabling your firewall. I don't even have it enabled while I play league. So I am gonna get reported and banned for something I did not do wrong?
